# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the object annotation that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing an annotation

- **description**: A text representation of the object annotation.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the object annotation within a playground.
